text: CBS All Access has been building up its slate of original programming, planning to launch 10 new shows next year. And arguably the buzziest one of them all is the Jordan Peele - led reboot of the classic science fiction series “ The Twilight Zone. ” So how did CBS All Access, a small but growing player in the high - stakes streaming wars, land the Oscar - winning writer and director of “ Get Out ”? “ We actually had heard that Jordan was such a fan of the original series that he credits it to some extent with his interest in becoming an artist, ” Julie McNamara, executive VP, original content, CBS All Access, told TheWrap. “ Having heard that, we pursued a conversation with him to see if that ’ s something he would be interested in. ” It won ’
